description: This recipe is so easy! Simply cook up plant-based meatballs and lay them on a bed of fluffy grilled naan bread for a no-fuss, plant-based dinner.
keywords: Meatballs,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Egg free,Plant-based,Spring,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Plant-Based Meatballs On Grilled Naan Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine yoghurt, cumin and lemon juice in a small bowl. Season and set aside. Divide each burger into 4, then roll into balls.
Heat 1 tbs oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook plant-based balls, turning, for 8 minutes or until golden and cooked through.
Meanwhile, heat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Brush naan with remaining oil, then cook for 2 minutes on each side or until charred and warmed through.
Spread yoghurt mixture evenly over each naan. Top with spinach, cucumber, plant-based balls and onion. Season with pepper and serve drizzled with a little extra oil.
